headline: Meta in talks to hire former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman to join AI efforts, The Information reports

headline: Stocks rise, Amazon CEO says AI will shrink workforce, Circle jumps
summary: All three of the major indexes (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are trading higher as Wall Street awaits the Fed decision and developments on the conflict between Iran and Israel. OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) CEO Sam Altman says Meta (META) was offering $100 million bonuses in a bid to poach the AI firm's employees.  Amazon (AMZN) CEO Andy Jassy says AI will reduce the size of his company's workforce.  Shares of Circle (CRCL) are jumping after the Senate passed the GENIUS Act. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Meta, social media, stablecoin-related stocks: Trending Tickers
summary: Meta (META) is offering $100 million bonuses to OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) developers as the tech giant builds out its artificial intelligence (AI) team. Social media stocks, like Meta, Snap (SNAP), and Pinterest (PINS), are in focus after the White House confirmed that President Trump will sign an executive order this week to extend the TikTok delay, allowing the ByteDance-owned platform to avoid a US ban. The Senate passed the GENIUS stablecoin bill, sending stablecoin-related stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), and Circle (CRCL) higher. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Meta offered $100 mn bonuses to poach OpenAI employees: CEO Altman
summary: Meta offered $100 million bonuses to OpenAI employees in an unsuccessful bid to poach the ChatGPT maker's talent and strengthen its own generative AI teams, the startup's CEO, Sam Altman, has said.Facebook's parent company -- a competitor of OpenAI -- also offered "giant" annual salaries exceeding $100 million to OpenAI staffers, Altman said in an interview on the "Uncapped with Jack Altman" podcast released Tuesday.

headline: Prediction: 2 Stocks That'll Be Worth More Than Apple 5 Years From Now

Amazon, meanwhile, is an AI leader, using the technology to drive growth and efficiencies. headline: Sam Altman says Meta offered $100 million bonuses to OpenAI employees
summary: The alleged attempts by Meta to hire OpenAI staffers are the latest signs of a frenzy to hire top engineers to develop AI models, and they come at a time when the Facebook owner is working on building its superintelligence unit to catch up with competitors.  Competition for AI talent has reached a feverish pitch as superstar researchers are being courted like professional athletes on the belief that individual contributors can make or break companies.  "They (Meta) started making giant offers to a lot of people on our team," Altman said on the Uncapped podcast that aired on Tuesday, hosted by his brother.

raw.headline: Sam Altman says Meta offered $100 million bonuses to OpenAI employees
raw.summary: The alleged attempts by Meta to hire OpenAI staffers are the latest signs of a frenzy to hire top engineers to develop AI models, and they come at a time when the Facebook owner is working on building its superintelligence unit to catch up with competitors.  Competition for AI talent has reached a feverish pitch as superstar researchers are being courted like professional athletes on the belief that individual contributors can make or break companies.  "They (Meta) started making giant offers to a lot of people on our team," Altman said on the Uncapped podcast that aired on Tuesday, hosted by his brother.
